org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter

Interface Formatter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable

    public interface Formatter
extends Closeable

    Provides text-only formatting.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Deprecated. 
      future versions of the formatter interface will support editing, so closing is no-longer relevant

      Gets the formatter configuration

                                  LayoutMasterProperties properties)
